body.name: Chefman MicroCrisp Countertop Digital Microwave Oven, Unique "Cook & Crisp" Power Combo, 1.1 Cu Ft, Dual-Cook 1000W Microwave + 1500W Crisper, 6 Touch Presets, Digital Display, Stainless Steel Handle
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 8 mins
features: NO MORE SOGGY MICROWAVE FOOD: Reheat leftovers with a crispy crunch! Cook chicken with a crackly skin finish, get crispy instead of soggy fries, and reheat your pizza with a crunchy crust.

STREAMLINED SETUP: The user-guided touch control panel on our MicroCrisp countertop microwave ovens help you choose the perfect cooking time and temperatures for the results you want without the guesswork.

POWER COMBO COOKING: The unique cook and crisp function offer dual cooking options in one so you can get the same results from a typical oven or microwave in one appliance. It's like a microwave air fryer combo that heats and crisps all in one.

GUESS FREE PRESETS: With 6 precision presets, you don't have to guess how long to cook your favorite foods. Simply choose your food, cook, defrost, pop, reheat, and your convection microwave will do the rest!

KEEP IT QUIET: The alarm mute option silences all MicroCrisp microwave cooker alarms. Allow your baby to sleep soundly in the middle of the day, or for early risers or night owls, keep your noise to a minimum while the rest of the house sleeps.
PERFECTLY SIZED: This 20.5 x 16 x 12 inch microwave with a 1.1 cubic ft capacity is perfectly sized to cook everything you need while still fitting in seamlessly with your other kitchen appliances.

BIG POWER: The unique power cooking combo combines a 1000 Watt microwave with cooking levels 1-10, and 1800 Watt crisp at 400°F to achieve that perfect hot, crispy reheat so you can look forward to your leftovers.
EASY CARE: The easy wipe-down interior and dishwasher-safe glass cooking plate allow spills and crumbs to get easily wiped up so you can keep your microwave countertop oven looking like new.
RESOURCES: UL approved with advanced safety technology for long-lasting durability and a 1-year assurance provided by Chefman. 1800W/120V-RJ55-MF
body.description: With the Chefman MicroCrisp Microwave, you can reheat leftovers like never before! The unique cook and crisp combination heats up food fast and finishes it off with a unique crispy crunch. The 6 precision presets and user-guided touch control simplifies programming for perfectly cooked foods. Ideal for small kitchens without sacrificing power and the mute alarm option allows for use while family or friends are still asleep. Purchase includes a 1-year assurance from Chefman. For information on how to use your product, scroll down for a PDF User Guide.1800 Watts/120 Volts–RJ55-MF • Unique Micro-Crisp technology • 6 precision cooking presets • User-guided touch control panel • 1000W microwave with power levels 1-10 • 1800W crisp at 400°F • Mute alarm option • Digital clock • Child safety lock • Small space-saving counter microwave • Perfect reheating for pizza • Deep 1.1 cubic foot capacity • 20.5 x 16 x 12 inches

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best microwave we've owned!
reviews.reviewText: Finally, someone produced a microwave that does everything accurately and easily! It's intuitive to use, and soooo quiet, that sometimes I don't realize it's on! Cooks and defrosts evenly, better than more expensive units we've owned. It's smaller, but easily holds a dinner plate or casserole for reheating. Even my husband, who doesn't like anything that requires him to be an engineer to use, loves it! Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little microwave!
reviews.reviewText: When this microwave arrived, my husband took one look and said, “It’s pretty small.” And he’s right. It is, but I’m not warming up elephants. It fits a dinner plate perfectly, and it heats very quickly and evenly. It’s not a countertop hog. Also, it’s quiet! The microwave we replaced sounded like jets were warming up in the kitchen. This one has a quiet hum you can barely hear from the next room. So far, it’s perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought This based on the reviews and I’m pleased. It’s nice looking and easy to use and i love how it has a 30 second button for my dogs food. It’s quiet and easy to use and i hope It lasts 18 years like my last one did. I reco This definitely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does the job
reviews.reviewText: It heats quickly and well. It is small, but that is what I wanted. The only thing I don't like is it is noisy when running, and especially noisy when you open and close the door. It has a tinny sound. I would rather pay a little more and have a better quality product. I had one, but it was too big for what I use it for so I decided to buy this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but nice
reviews.reviewText: The microwave is small like for a dorm room but it works well I like the feature whatever number you push that how long it goes. For example, if I need 5 mins I can push 5 and not have to put in 500 . Really nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little microwave:)
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this microwave from low noise, to ease of use with the keypad, to it cooking everything I needed. I don't make family sized meals, so this is perfect for what I need. Very easy to keep clean. I wipe it out after each use. I haven't had it long but would highly recommend it for simple use, so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Far So Good!
reviews.reviewText: Still learning how to use all the features, but it’s working very well. I’d like to warn others who go by the reviews, for some reason they have lumped different models of these Chefman Microwaves into the same category, the 0.7, along with the 1.0 and the model that uses a ‘MicroCrisp’ feature as well ( a 1.0). The 0.9 seems to have the best reviews but unless you are really paying attention it will seem as though they all apply to the 0.9. This can be quite misleading and confusing. Anyhow, hoping this model, the 0.9 will work for a long time to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the features
reviews.reviewText: This is the first microwave I can truly say I love. The clock light isn't so bright it lights up the room and the mute allows you to not have to hear the beeps. It also has a childproof lock. The small profile is great for small spaces or countertops where you don't have a lot of room. It's a nice looking microwave and I'm glad I chose this one. I had a terrible experience with the Farberware microwave and their customer service so I'm hoping this one lasts longer
